rooms.description: Minimalist entryway with floor-to-ceiling windows on one side for natural light.
Open-plan living space that doubles as a home theater, featuring retractable projector screen and integrated sound system. Floor-to-ceiling windows along the front wall to enhance natural light.
Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. Designed with floor-to-ceiling glass elements for scenic views.
Comfy guest room designed to reflect minimalist aesthetics, adjacent to a shared living area.
Modern kitchen with an integrated dining space. Includes floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural lighting and views of the garden.
Dedicated storage area for household supplies and maintenance.

openings.description: A single glass door with a modern minimalist design opens to the garden.
Floor-to-ceiling windows on multiple facades for enhanced natural light and scenic views.
A glassed-in terrace overlooking the garden, aligning with Vastu principles of open space.

levels.level_description: The ground floor is designed to maximize natural light through extensive use of floor-to-ceiling windows and provide a seamless indoor-outdoor living experience. Layouts are in line with minimalist aesthetics while incorporating luxury elements such as a home theater and large garden access.
